Package com.badlogic.gdx.utils

Interface Summary
LocklessThreadQueue.ObjectFactory<T> Interface for an Object Factory for the initial buffer creation.
Pool.PoolObjectFactory<T> Interface for an Object Factory to be used with this Pool
 

Class Summary
BufferUtils Class with static helper methods to increase the speed of array/direct buffer and direct buffer/direct buffer transfers
IntHashMap<T> An int to object hashmap, taken from Amarena2D (thanks Christoph :p).
LittleEndianInputStream Taken from http://www.javafaq.nu/java-example-code-1079.html
LocklessThreadQueue<T> A specialized lockless thread queue class template for doing single direction message passing from one thread to another.
LongHashMap<T> An long to object hashmap, taken from Amarena2D (thanks Christoph :p).
MathUtils Utility and fast math functions.
PauseableThread A pausable thread.
Pool<T> A pool implementation used for object instances that should get reused instead of being collected by the garbage collector.
PooledLinkedList<T> A simple linked list that pools its nodes.
 

Exception Summary
GdxRuntimeException Typed runtime exception used throughout libgdx
